subject: Throttle problem - order SSN2239
description_text:
Hello,

On August 5th 2025 I ordered Simson Plus X pedals under order number
SSN2239.
Yesterday a problem appeared with my throttle, when I drive suddenly my
throttle becomes stiff, and I have to press it really hard a couple of
times to get it working again. At first I was thinking this is a one time
thing, but it repeats again unexpectedly when I continue to use pedals.
I was not able to determine why it happens but I'm suspecting of two things
at the moment, it is either hydraulic damper or blue silicon roller which
stops throttle movement at one point when pressed (picture attached).
Please if you already had some experience with this kind of problem I would
appreciate your help, as when this happens It stops me from driving so I'm
not able to enjoy any competitive sim racing with other drivers until this
is solved.

Best regards!
Vlado

conversations.body_text: Hi Vlado Vrlika,     Please clean the dust off your pedals, especially the silver hydraulic rod. Excessive dust may affect the travel distance. You can apply a little lubricant and then test the pedals again.

Hello,

Thank you for your answer.
In the picture, it looks like there is a lot of dust because I used a flash
and a micro camera, but actually, it is pretty clean (I clean dust
regularly).
All the dust from the picture is not visible to the eye (attached is the
same picture, just without flash)

Regarding applying the lubricant, could you just tell me if I should use
one that is silicone or oil based?

Best regards!
Vlado Vrlika

On Fri, Nov 28, 2025 at 4:41 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi Vlado Vrlika,  You can try applying a small amount of silicone-based lubricant. If this doesn’t resolve the issue, I will send you a new one.

Hello,

I applied some lubricant but it did not resolve the problem.
I have noticed that the problem appears actually when depressing pedal and
not at the moment when I'm pressing it.

Best regards!
Vlado
